Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: ThomasItIs
Reviews.Content: I got got this today, even though the arrival date is supposed to be 3 days from now. It came with everything that it said it would and I'm extremely happy and impressed with my product, anyone who says samsung can't make digital cameras and they should just get a canon are WRONG. This camera is amazing and I recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: GeorgiaYankee
Reviews.Content: Samsung got it right on this one. Great quality pictures and easy to use in auto mode.  Also has plenty of manual controls for those that like to tweak their settings.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Meek Plfd
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for the purchase price, it fits in the palm of your hand.  Takes really nice pictures in low light and when the subject is moving (running, jumping or just clowning around).  The only thing I could have done with out is that tripod what a complete waste of material.... Other then that great for the price and zoom.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung - PL210 Superzoom 14MP Compact Silver Digital Camera, 10x Wide-Angle Zoom, Dual Image Stabilization, HD Video, 3" LCD, Face Recognition. Bundle Includes 8 GB Memory Card, Card Reader, Deluxe Carrying Case, Mini Tripod, and 3Pcs. Lens Cleaning Kit.
